mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board values ( board_id_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{email}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modified_at = sysdate WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, EMAIL, CREATE_AT, MODIFIED_AT FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(board board_pk) */ rownum rn, board.* FROM board WHERE rownum > 0 and rownum <=(#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
